title: Pushy Bottom
description: Darren Black has been watching beautiful, aloof sub Nikolai for some time. Nic is the pushiest bottom he’s ever seen. Doms don’t stick with him for long, but Darren plans on being the one who does. After spending a night together in one intense scene after another, Darren introduces Nic to the pleasures of waking up with a lover. Could Darren be the one to claim Nic?
author: Sean Michael
